title: Client Update Issues
body: Tried updating my client today and nothing happens {{item:3070}}  Now every time I click Launch on the Legacy client this error pops up : "The application was unable to start correctly (0xc0000005)". Already ran the Hextech Repair Tool nothing. Second time this has happen why can't I update my client??

replies.body: Nope nothing think I'm just gonna give up on league for now

This could be happening as a result of a missing/bad file or security setting preventing it from being accessed.  As a first step, run through each instruction of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure it's not an access issue.  Let me know if you run into any issues.  {{item:3004}}
